title: Pharmacy
text: Started my college expedition as Pharmacy major, then dropped out of college due to family emergency.

title: Business Management & Finance
text: Started college again after a long break, but realize I couldn't get back into Pharmacy, then switched over to double major of Business Management and Finance.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
text: Discovered my passion for coding during the boot camp where I learned computer science theories and built full-stack applications through hands-on projects.

title: Solutions Architect
text: Currently studying for AWS Solutions Architect certification to become a certified AWS professional.
